abstract: Europe may be a mess, the United States is having a slow recovery, and China is losing steam, but information technology is doing well. Researchers at Gartner project an increase greater than they forecast last quarter, led by cloud computing and new kinds of devices.

headline.main: Information Technology Spending to Hit $3.6 Trillion in 2012, Report Says
